channel.title: How To listen To Music During Class
channel.description: Eyyy me and a couple of friends have been doing this trick for a while and we have never been caught doing it. Usally no one will notice you if you do it right. First you need a mp3 like a ipod and a shirt with long sleeves. slip it into your pocket and bring the headphones up your shirt sleeve so no one will see the wire. put the headphone in your ear and lean your head on your hand so your hand is covering up everything. Keep the volume low so someone passing by wont hear anything. you can also cheat this way. If you have a voice recorder you can record your notes and play them back on your mp3.

item.title: How To listen To Music During Class
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

my teachers back when i was in school were the best!! I’d be able to walk in, grab their nice seats pull it over to my desk sit back put my feet up, pop some tunes on my ipod grab a sandwich and a soda maybe some chips and start class every class i could do that except auto . . . teacher had a crapy chair so i sat at his podium . . . ah good times

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @MidGuardian MidGuardian
item.description:
@MidGuardian wrote:

[quote=“damon, post:24, topic:75018”]heres another method sneak into the main office and play the music over the loud speakers

(i haven’t done it personally but it has happened at our school the person who did it changed the password on the comp and locked it so that it would keep on playing and you couldn’t turn it off it was also on a loop so the same song repeated over and over)[/quote]
Hmm… Wouldnt They Just Turn The Computer Off From The Main Power?

item.title: How To listen To Music During Class
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

ikick221:

lol

Rule 4: We don't make posts that contain not useful information. Posts like "cool", [b]"lol"[/b], "yeah" and "I agree" don't contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.
bumr055:

I find the easiest way is just plug the earphones in put the mp3 player in your pocket, or hand, desk, wherever the fuck you want… and when the teacher says “put that away, or ill take it” say “Lets see you try you stupid little cunt!”

You’re an idiot who has obviously never done that before.

Read full topic
